LOADING_COLOR_DOC: Color to display before Volumio is ready
READY_COLOR_DOC: Color to display when Volumio is ready to play
PLAYING_COLOR_DOC: Color to display when Volumio is playing music
RED_GPIO_DOC: GPIO pin connected to the LED's red pin (BCM format)
GREEN_GPIO_DOC: GPIO pin connected to the LED's green pin (BCM format)
BLUE_GPIO_DOC: GPIO pin connected to the LED's blue pin (BCM format)
